analysis.key_quote: This rule would strip thousands of federal employees of their due process rights and protections under Title 5. They would become at-will employees, vulnerable to removal without cause or the right to appeal.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting its threats to due process, merit protections, and the nonpartisan nature of the civil service, indicating a strong stance against politicization and erosion of employee rights.
